instructions: Open the Live Photo and tap Edit. Tap the Live Photo button , then do any of the following: Set a key photo: Move the white frame on the frame viewer, tap Make Key Photo, then tap Done. Trim a Live Photo: Drag either end of the frame viewer to choose the frames the Live Photo plays. Make a still photo: Tap the Live button at the top of the screen to turn off the Live feature. The Live Photo becomes a still of its key photo. Mute a Live Photo: Tap the mute button at the top of the screen. Tap again to unmute.
